id: quiz: Which Victoria Beckham are you?

options.title: Looking at dodgy pics of celebs

questions.title: What do you love to eat?
Your favourite high street shop is:
What do you do to keep fit?
Which one of these sentences do you most identify with?

options.title: If you wanna be my lover, you gotta get with my friends.
Candle light and soul forever, a dream of you and me together.
Slam it to the left if you're having a good time, shake it to the right, if you know that you feel fine.
We can do anything. I'll take you all the places you wanna be.

results.title: The original Posh Spice
results.text: The original and some say the best. You still like to pop on a boob tube and randomly point at people. You never smile in selfies.
results.facebookName: I am the original Posh Spice!
results.facebookDescription: Which Victoria Beckham are you? Take Metro's fiendish quiz to find out.
results.twitterText: I am the original Posh Spice! Take Metro's fiendish challenge to find out which Victoria Beckham you are.

results.title: WAG Victoria
results.text: Everyone says you've got spunk. If life deals you a blow, you come out fighting in red lippy and more tan. You're the Queen bee of your social group.
results.facebookDescription: Which Victoria Beckham are you? Take Metro's fiendish quiz to find out.
results.twitterText: I'm WAG Victoria! Take Metro's fiendish challenge to find out which Victoria Beckham you are.

results.title: LA Victoria
results.text: The bigger your blow-dry and the whiter your teeth, the better. You secretly want to spend your days eating Oreos and organising bake sales.
results.facebookDescription: Which Victoria Beckham are you? Take Metro's fiendish quiz to find out.
results.twitterText: I am LA Victoria! Take Metro's fiendish challenge to find out which Victoria Beckham you are.

results.title: Fashion bunny Beckham.
results.text: You've found your signature style and you've never looked so good. You're extremely driven but you love what you do (and you have a laugh doing it).
